SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: select tm.mno, tm.mname, tm.email, tm.tel, tm.birth, tm.mtype, tj.nic, tj.gender, tj.pst_no, tj.basic_addr, tj.det_addr, tj.prof, tj.pref_gender, tj.mrdt, tj.star_avg, tj.rev_avg from talat_memb tm left outer join talat_join tj on tm.mno=tj.mno order by tm.mno asc

select tm.mno, tm.mname, tm.email, tm.tel, tm.birth, tm.mtype, tj.nic, tj.gender, tj.pst_no, tj.basic_addr, tj.det_addr, tj.prof, tj.pref_gender, tj.mrdt, tj.star_avg, tj.rev_avg from talat_memb tm left outer join talat_join tj on tm.mno=tj.mno where tm.email = #{email} and tm.pwd = password(#{password})

select tm.mno, tm.mname, tm.email, tm.tel, tm.birth, tm.mtype, tj.nic, tj.gender, tj.pst_no, tj.basic_addr, tj.det_addr, tj.prof, tj.pref_gender, tj.mrdt, tj.star_avg, tj.rev_avg from talat_memb tm left outer join talat_join tj on tm.mno=tj.mno where tm.mno=#{value}
mapper.update: update talat_memb tm, talat_join tj set tm.mname=#{tm.mname}, tm.email=#{tm.email}, tm.pwd=#{tm.password}, tm.tel=#{tm.tel}, tm.birth=#{tm.birth}, tj.nic=#{tj.nicName}, tj.pst_no=#{tj.postNo}, tj.basic_addr=#{tj.basicAddress}, tj.det_addr=#{tj.detailAddress}, tj.prof=#{tj.profile}, tj.pref_gender=#{tj.preferenceGender} where tm.mno=#{value} and tj.mno=#{value}
mapper.delete: delete from tj, tm using talat_join tj inner join talat_memb tm on tj.mno=tm.mno where tj.mno=#{value}
